## Introduction

# Chapter 1.3, Gaussian Elimination

```{r}
# write a function for Gaussian Elimination on nx(n+1) matrix
ge <- function(matrix) {
  n <- dim(matrix)[1]
  new_matrix <- matrix

  for (ind in 2:n) {
    for (row in ind:n) {
      # print(paste("ind", ind))
      div <- new_matrix[row,row-1] / new_matrix[row-1,row-1]
      # print(paste("div", div))
      tmp <- div * new_matrix[row-1,]
      # print(paste("tmp", tmp))
      new_matrix[row,] <- new_matrix[row,] - tmp
    }
  }
    
  return(new_matrix)
}
```
